title: French swimmer Léon Marchand ventures into uncharted waters at the US Open
subhead: The four-time Olympic swimming champion is set to compete in his first long-course event of the season in Austin, Texas, on Thursday. His schedule includes five races, most of which are unusual for him.

title: Spain, Ireland and the Netherlands pull out of 2026 Eurovision over Israel's participation
subhead: The organizers of next year's Eurovision Song Contest announced they were allowing Israel to compete on Thursday, drawing quick announcements of withdrawals from European countries critical of the Israeli offensive in Gaza.

title: Iran's independent cinema in full revolt: 'With Woman, Life, Freedom, a major barrier was broken'
subhead: Galvanized by the movement that emerged after the death of Mahsa Amini in September 2022, more and more filmmakers are dating to shoot outside any official framework. In a country where film production is a state matter, their films, made and distributed clandestinely, show Iranian society as it really is.

subhead: In the half of the Palestinian enclave kept under Israeli army control, several hundred members of anti-Hamas militias and criminal gangs have been brought together. Israeli authorities intend to rely on these groups to counter the Islamist movement.
byline: By Louis Imbert and Marie Jo Sader

title: Negotiating peace: A chaotic art with no established rules
subhead: Donald Trump, casting himself as mediator in the Russia-Ukraine war, has been pushing Kyiv and European leaders to accept his 'peace plan,' drafted with Moscow. His seemingly erratic approach reveals a deeper issue: the absence of any standards governing peace processes.

title: 'Nighttime prohibition': Warsaw city center bans alcohol sales at night
subhead: Nearly 180 municipalities in Poland have already opted to ban the sale of alcohol at night. On November 1, two central districts in Warsaw followed suit. The measure, which was initially intended to apply across the entire capital, has sparked heated debate.
